name: Rules Of The Dice
description:
This Game Was Made In Less Than 48h Hours For The GMTK Game Jam 2022

You control a dice and according to the number displayed at the top of the dice, a rule will change,  and when the dice display 1,  all the rules are normal

The image on top left display the face that on the top of the dice

You have a pointer that say you where is the face one

Rules and order of the number(clockwise):

1: Normal

2: No Gravity

6: Heavy

5:Camera Rotating With Dice(Visual Effect)

And You Need To Reach The End Of The Level

Open the .exe file

The exe and the pck need to be in the same folder

Mac version doesn't work correctly
